note.p: Servant. Employed by Robert Waring Darwin at The Mount, Shrewsbury. Married Jane (1801/2–66), sister of RWD’s butler, Edward Evans. Later farmed in Shropshire (1861, 1871, 1881).

Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/926/8/10/15/23), 1851 (HO107/1992/632/20), 1861 (RG9/1875/34/12), 1871 (RG10/2778/35/12), 1881 (RG11/266/43/14)
Prerogative Court of Canterbury will registers (The National Archives: Public Record Office PROB 11/2046/209)
